item.title: MSFT is forcing Outlook & Teams to open links in Edge & IT admins are angry
item.description: - Microsoft is making changes to force the use of Edge browser for certain links in Teams and Outlook, which is angering IT admins.

item.title: Bank Failures Visualized
item.description: - The article discusses a visual representation of bank failures occurring between 1947 and 2023.

item.title: Replit's new Code LLM: Open Source, 77% smaller than Codex, trained in 1 week
item.description: - Replit has open-sourced their new code LLM, which is more efficient than OpenAI's Codex and trained in just one week.

item.title: I want to talk about WebGPU
item.description: - WebGPU is a new low-level graphics API that has been released for creating 2D and 3D graphics in web browsers and other software.

item.title: Passkeys: The beginning of the end of the password
item.description: - Google has started rolling out passkeys, a new way to sign in to apps and websites that is both easier to use and more secure than passwords.

item.title: OpenLLaMA: An Open Reproduction of LLaMA
item.description: - OpenLLaMA is a new open-source language model released by Berkeley AI Research that reproduces Meta AI's LLaMA language model.
